# metadata

**Instance Property**

Optional custom metadata associated with the proposed item.

## Declaration

```swift
var metadata: [AVMetadataItem] { get set }
```

## Discussion

In addition to the title and preview image, you can associate any custom metadata you need for the presentation of this content proposal.

## Configuring the Content Proposal

- **contentTimeForTransition**: The time within the timeline of the current player item when the content proposal presentation should begin.
- **title**: The title of the proposed content.
- **previewImage**: The preview image of the proposed item.
- **automaticAcceptanceInterval**: The interval between the time playback ends and automatic acceptance of this content proposal.
- **url**: The URL of the proposed content.
